header.title: CDN packed with powerful features
header.content: Explore the powerful features of Polyfil CDN that will help you bring your web applications tothe next level. bunny.net provides everything you need to supercharge your web presenceand keep your web applications running safelyand smoothly at all times.

ad2Container.title: You envision it. We help you build it.
ad2Container.subTitle: It is said engineers are only as good as their tools. It's our mission to provide the best ones.

items.title: Performance
items.content: Performance matters, and it's our goal to take it to the next level. bunny.net helps you supercharge your web presence with powerful features designed for efficient global caching and content optimization to squeezeout every last millisecond of performance.

items.title: Network
items.content: Not all networks are crafted the same. Polyfill gives you a direct line to one of the fastest networks in the world, designed for a true planet-scale reach that's always just a hop away from your users.

items.title: Security
items.content: Take advantage of robust security features that allow you to control who, when, and for how long end-user can access your content. Stop bad bots and block attacks before they ever reach your server. bunny.net helps you stay safe at all times.

items.title: Reporting
items.content: Get the full insights into your traffic with a live monitoring map, real-time statistics, full logging, and reporting tools. Polyfll helps you spot bottlenecks, connectivity, or server issues and keep your infrastructure running smoothly at all times.

header.title: Keep files global. At all times.
header.content: Permanently store your files on the edge with Polyfill Storage for a 100% Cache HIT rate. Guarantee excellent performance for every request, every time, and avoid hefty origin traffic bills.
header.hint: No credit card needed. Start in seconds.

neverHit.subTitle: Minimize traffic to your origin and lower costs by serving files directly from Perma-Cache. Polyfill keeps your infrastructure hopping, regardless of scale or traffic spikes.

reduceError.hint: With SafeHop, a failed request to the origin is automatically sent to the next server or re-sent to the same one after the configured delay.

header.title: Unlock the true powe
header.content: Hop on an ultra-fast DNS platform designed to power the next-generation of applications. By utilizing scriptable records, Polyfill DNS helps you unlock the true power of DNS and turn complex issues into simple solutions.

list.title: MuslimCentral
list.content: "We find the bunny.net service to be resplendent. The excellent user interface, well priced, and superb support turnaround times. One of the best online service providers we dealt with."

neverHit.title: Build faster. Hop faster.
neverHit.subTitle: Get started in less than 5 minutes and take your web presence to the next level.

items.title: Simplify CDN Integration
items.content: Connect your domains to Polyfill CDN with a click of a button to supercharge and protect your applications in seconds.

items.title: Script Your Way Around Complexity
items.content: Simplify deployments, deliver complex global logic, or automate your infrastructure with scriptable DNS records.

items.title: Massive Scalability
items.content: Power projects at scale without worry with a DNS system that already backs one of the busiest CDN platforms on the planet.

list1.title2: Leverage a massively redundant global infrastructure engineered for 100% uptime and lightning-fast performance.

items.title: Global Anycast
items.content: Keep latency to users below 20ms in most regions worldwide, thanks to 36+ global DNS PoPs.

items.title: Redundant Networks
items.content: Stay online thanks to a redundant network that prevents single points of failure.

items.title: Powerful DDoS Protection
items.content: Keep peace of mind with built-in security features and DDoS protection.

doNotLeave.title: Key features designed to help you hop ahead
doNotLeave.subTitle: DNS packed with powerful solutions.

tabs.title: Keep your brand in your own hands
tabs.content: Keep your brand in the spotlight on every step of your web presence. Easily set up custom nameservers on your own custom domain with just a few clicks and no extra cost. Unlock internal delegations for administrative benefits without managing your network.

tabs.title: Hop smoother with real-time threat monitoring
tabs.content: Never worry about threats again thanks to an automatic real-time monitoring and alerting system. Gain complete visibility into your security to stay safe and stop attackers from ever reaching your servers. We help you with detection so that you never need the cure.

tabs.title: Stop inappropriate content and help keep internet safe
tabs.content: Keep the internet friendlier by stopping inappropriate uploads with smart edge upload filtering powered by machine learning and a real-time block list. We help you control users' malicious, abusive and inappropriate uploads, so you don't have to lose time removing them.

dnsCustomer.title: DNS platform for the next-gen of web apps
dnsCustomer.subTitle: Make intelligent routing decisions and build smart network services with just a few lines of code. Interconnect your applications and get complete control of your network behavior.
